i2s_audio.docs:
The `i2s_audio` media player platform allows you to play media from webservers and web streams via the [I²S Audio Component](https://esphome.io/components/i2s_audio.html). This platform only works on ESP32 based chips.

*See also: [I²S Audio Media Player](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/i2s_audio.html#i2s-audio-media-player)*

play_media.docs:
This action will start playing the specified media.

*See also: [`media_player.play_media` Action](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-play-media-action)*

volume_down.docs:
This action will decrease the volume of the media player.

*See also: [`media_player.volume_down` Action](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-volume-down-action)*

volume_up.docs:
This action will increase the volume of the media player.

*See also: [`media_player.volume_up` Action](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-volume-up-action)*

stop.docs:
This action stops the current playback.

*See also: [`media_player.stop` Action](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-stop-action)*

pause.docs:
This action pauses the current playback.

*See also: [`media_player.pause` Action](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-pause-action)*

toggle.docs:
This action will pause or resume the current playback.

*See also: [`media_player.toggle` Action](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-toggle-action)*

play.docs:
This action will resume playing the media player.

*See also: [`media_player.play` Action](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-play-action)*

volume_set.docs:
This action will set the volume of the media player.

*See also: [`media_player.volume_set` Action](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-volume-set-action)*

is_playing.docs:
This condition checks if the media player is playing media.

*See also: [`media_player.is_playing` Condition](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-is-playing-condition)*

is_idle.docs:
This condition checks if the media player is idle.

*See also: [`media_player.is_idle` Condition](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html#media-player-is-idle-condition)*
